resources.string: We are currently working on this section. It will be ready soon...
Network error! Please check your connection and try again.
The password or email are incorrect. Please check and try again
Invalid data. Please check the format and try again
You are now connected to the server...
There was an error. Please take the picture again.
There was an error. Please select the picture again.
Your location is going to be registered in a database
Please select or take a picture.
Are you sure you want to close the session
This will delete all the data in the current form. Are your sure
There's already an image loaded. What do you want to do
This device doesn't have camera support
You must enter a valid First name.
You must enter a valid Last name.
You must enter a valid Id(include periods and hyphen).
You must enter a valid occupation.
You must enter a valid email.
You must enter a valid address.
You must enter a valid phone number. Remember the international format(+56XXXXXXXX).
You must enter a valid marital status.
You must enter a valid gender.
Please enter a valid caracter for the Chilean Id:
No internet connection! Please connect the device and retry.
The image is too heavy! Please lower the camera's resolution and try again.
The image is too heavy! Please Select another one.
The image is too heavy! Please lower the camera's resolution or select another one from the gallery.
Error loading the image. Please try again or use another one.
There was an error while sending files. Please retry.
You must select an image file.
